description.value:
Wondrous item, common (+1), uncommon (+2), or rare (+3) (requires attunement by a ranger)
This small fetish is made out of bones, feathers, and semi‑precious gems. Typically worn around the neck, this charm can also be wrapped around your brow or wrist or affixed to a weapon.
While wearing or carrying this charm, you have a bonus to attack and damage rolls made against your favored enemies. The bonus is determined by the charm’s rarity.
